full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL LDAN SA GSUM MA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,CES RGYAL BA THAMS CAD KYI MKHYEN BTZE GCIG TU BSDUS PA'I NGO BO, LNGA BRGYA PA RNAMS KYI GTZUG GI NOR BU DPAL LDAN BLA MA DAM PA RJE BTZUN BTZONG KHA PA CHEN PO NYID KYI RNAM PAR THAR PA MDO TZAM ZHIG BRJOD PA'I SGO NAS GSOL BA 'DEBS PA'I TSIGS SU BCAD PA 'DI NI, SNGA GONG NAS DGE SBYONG SDOM BRTZON MCHOG BZANG BA LA SOGS PA MANG PO ZHIG GI NAN CHER BSKUL ZHING, PHYIS DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN NYI MA SNYING @008B POS YANG YANG BSKUL TE, RNAM THAR GYI SGO NAS GSOL BA 'DEBS PA SNYAN DNGAGS KYI BRDAS MA BCINGS PA'I GO BDE BAR BRJOD PA ZHIG BGYIS ZHES GSUNG PA DANG, BDAG NYID KYI MCHOG TU DAD PAS KYANG NYE BAR BSKUL TE, RJE BTZUN BLA MA DE NYID KYI ZHABS KYI PADMO LA NYE BAR BTUGS PA'I BKA' DRIN GYIS 'TSO BA, MANG DU THOS PA'I BTZUN PA DGE LEGS DPAL BZANG POS SBYAR BA PHYOGS DUS THAMS CAD DU BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,SKYE ZHING SKYE BA DAG NI THAMS CAD DU, ,RIGS BZANG BLO GSAL NGA RGYAL MED PA DANG, ,SNYING RJE CHE ZHING BLA MA LA GUS PAS, ,DPAL LDAN BLA MA'I DAM TSIG @009A *, ,LA GNAS SHOG ,TSE RABS KUN TU RGYAL BA TZONG KHA PAS, ,THEG MCHOG BSHES GNYEN DNGOS SU MDZAD PA'I MTHUS, ,RGYAL BAS BSNGAGS PA'I LAM BZANG DE NYID LAS, ,SKAD CIG TZAM YANG LDOG PAR MA GYUR CIG ,DGE BA 'DI YIS TSE RABS KUN TU BDAG ,MTSUNGS MED BLO BZANG GRAGS PA'I ZHABS DRUNG DU, ,SA DANG LAM GYI RIM PA MTHAR SON NAS, ,'GRO KUN SANGS RGYAS SA LA 'GOD PAR SHOG , ,,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,
